application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that in relation to the part discharge of Condition 10 (Fire Statement) this decision notice pertains only to Condition 10A (principles of a fire statement).To fully discharge Condition 10 a subsequent application would need to be submitted to discharge part B of Condition 10. This requires the submission of the final comprehensive fire statement accompanied by the Building Control Decision Notice (or equivalent) prior to occupation.
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 10A (Fire Statement), 12 (Management Plan), 15 (Landscaping) and 17 (Replacement Trees) of planning permission ref. 2145/APP/2022/3534, dated 18-01-2023 (Demolition of existing school building and construction of part one storey, part two storey Special Education Needs and Disability School (SEND) (Use Class F), together with associated landscaping, play space, access, refuse and recycling storage, car and cycle parking and associated works.)
